title: Donald Trump Jr. Discusses New Book, 2020
itunes:title: Donald Trump Jr. Discusses New Book, 2020
description:
Donald Trump Jr. discusses the 2020 presidential campaign, the impeachment inquiry against President Trump, U.S. trade policy and his new book, "Triggered: How the Left Thrives on Hate and Wants to Silence Us." He speaks with Kevin Cirilli, Chief Washington Correspondent for Bloomberg Television and Radio.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
